project(css)

include_directories(
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libcss/include
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libcss/src
	${PARSERUTILS_INC_DIR}
	${WAPCAPLET_INC_DIR}
	)
set(LIBCSS_SRC_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libcss/src PARENT_SCOPE)
set(LIBCSS_INC_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libcss/include PARENT_SCOPE)

	libcss/src/select/properties/margin_bottom.c

add_library(css STATIC
	${SOURCES})
